data.title: Yearly & Monthly weather
data.meta_description: Hwali, Zimbabwe - Climate and weather forecast by month. Detailed climate information with charts - average monthly weather with temperature, pressure, humidity, precipitation, wind, daylight, sunshine, visibility, and UV index data. The month with the most rainfall is December, when the rain falls for 14.2 days and typically aggregates up to 62mm (2.44") of precipitation. In Hwali, during the entire year, the rain falls for 81.4 days and collects up to 242mm (9.53") of precipitation.
data.text:
Average temperature

Hwali, Zimbabwe

The warmest month (with the highest average high temperature) is October (32.4째C).

The month with the lowest average high temperature is July (23.1째C).

The month with the highest average low temperature is December (21.8째C).

The coldest month (with the lowest average low temperature) is July (11.2째C).

Average daylight / Average sunshine

Hwali, Zimbabwe

The month with the longest days is December (Average daylight: 13h and 24min).

The month with the shortest days is June (Average daylight: 10h and 48min).

The month with the most sunshine is October (Average sunshine: 11h and 18min).

The months with the least sunshine are April, July and August (Average sunshine: 7h and 12min).

Average UV index

Hwali, Zimbabwe

The months with the highest UV index are January, October, November and December (UV index 7).

The months with the lowest UV index are May, June and July (UV index 5).

Average visibility

Hwali, Zimbabwe

The months with the highest visibility are January, February, March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October, November and December (10km).

The months with the lowest visibility are January, February, March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October, November and December (10km).
